SELECT ISS.GLBL_CMPY_CD , ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_PK FROM INVTY_SNAP_SHOT ISS WHERE ISS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND ISS.LOC_TP_CD = #locTpCd#
AND ((ISS.MLY_CLO_YR_MTH IS NULL
AND ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_DT <= #delDtDly#)
OR ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_DT = #batProcDt#)

SELECT ISS.GLBL_CMPY_CD , ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_PK FROM INVTY_SNAP_SHOT ISS WHERE ISS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND ISS.LOC_TP_CD = #locTpCd#
AND (ISS.MLY_CLO_YR_MTH IS NOT NULL
AND ISS.MLY_CLO_YR_MTH <= #delDtMly#)

SELECT ISS.GLBL_CMPY_CD , ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_PK FROM INVTY_SNAP_SHOT ISS WHERE ISS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND ISS.LOC_TP_CD = #locTpCd#
AND ((ISS.MLY_CLO_YR_MTH IS NULL
AND ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_DT <= #delDtDly#) OR (ISS.MLY_CLO_YR_MTH IS NOT NULL AND ISS.MLY_CLO_YR_MTH <= #delDtMly#) OR ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_DT = #batProcDt#)

SELECT IVT.GLBL_CMPY_CD , IVT.MDSE_CD , IVT.INVTY_LOC_CD , IVT.LOC_STS_CD , IVT.STK_STS_CD , IVT.LOC_TP_CD , IVT.INVTY_QTY , IVT.INVTY_ALLOC_QTY , IVT.INVTY_AVAL_QTY , INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_SQ.NEXTVAL AS INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_PK FROM INVTY IVT WHERE IVT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND IVT.LOC_TP_CD = #locTpCd#
AND IVT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT ISS.EZTABLEID , ISS.EZCANCELFLAG , ISS.EZINTIME , ISS.EZINTIMEZONE , ISS.EZINCOMPANYCODE , ISS.EZINUSERID , ISS.EZINAPLID , ISS.EZUPTIME , ISS.EZUPTIMEZONE , ISS.EZUPCOMPANYCODE , ISS.EZUPUSERID , ISS.EZUPAPLID , ISS.GLBL_CMPY_CD , ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_PK , ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_DT , ISS.MDSE_CD , ISS.INVTY_LOC_CD , ISS.LOC_STS_CD , ISS.STK_STS_CD , ISS.MLY_CLO_YR_MTH , ISS.LOC_TP_CD , ISS.INVTY_QTY , ISS.INVTY_ALLOC_QTY , ISS.INVTY_AVAL_QTY FROM INVTY_SNAP_SHOT ISS WHERE ISS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND ISS.LOC_TP_CD = #locTpCd#
AND ISS.MLY_CLO_YR_MTH = #mlyCloDt#
AND ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_DT <> #snapShotDt#
AND ISS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT ISS.EZTABLEID , ISS.EZCANCELFLAG , ISS.EZINTIME , ISS.EZINTIMEZONE , ISS.EZINCOMPANYCODE , ISS.EZINUSERID , ISS.EZINAPLID , ISS.EZUPTIME , ISS.EZUPTIMEZONE , ISS.EZUPCOMPANYCODE , ISS.EZUPUSERID , ISS.EZUPAPLID , ISS.GLBL_CMPY_CD , ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_PK , ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_DT , ISS.MDSE_CD , ISS.INVTY_LOC_CD , ISS.LOC_STS_CD , ISS.STK_STS_CD , ISS.MLY_CLO_YR_MTH , ISS.LOC_TP_CD , ISS.INVTY_QTY , ISS.INVTY_ALLOC_QTY , ISS.INVTY_AVAL_QTY FROM INVTY_SNAP_SHOT ISS WHERE ISS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND ISS.LOC_TP_CD = #locTpCd#
AND ISS.INVTY_SNAP_SHOT_DT = #snapShotDt# AND ISS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
